title: Skip Holtz
summary: Louis Leo "Skip" Holtz Jr. (born March 12, 1964) is an American football coach who was most recently the current head coach for the Louisiana Tech Bulldogs football team. Previously, he was head coach for the South Florida Bulls (2010–2012), East Carolina Pirates (2005–2009), and Connecticut Huskies (1994–1998).  He has also served as an assistant coach for the South Carolina Gamecocks (1999–2004), Notre Dame Fighting Irish (1990–1993), Colorado State Rams (1989) and Florida State Seminoles (1987-1988).
